headline: KKR (NYSE:KKR) Eyes UK Compare The Market Stake And Arnott's Asset Deal Synergies
summary: KKR (NYSE:KKR) is reportedly part of the discussion for acquiring a stake in Compare the Market Limited and is eyeing the acquisition of Arnott's Biscuits Limited, which may have influenced its share price movement in the last quarter. The company's stock rose 8% over the period, aligning with flat performance in broader markets amid volatility from geopolitical tensions in the Middle East and fluctuations in oil prices.
